name: Rise of SamuraizerzZz
description:
After spending all summer in the depths of the Internet, the protagonist didn't notice how the world had changed. For the first time in months, he went outside in search of adventure.



Explore the open-world and meet together with your friends and then decide what you will do next: will you try to save the Town or have a noble drinking party?

In the course of the plot, you will discover new playable characters. Each of them has unique skills, their own home and wardrobe. You can play all at once.

Despite the complete isolation and strict suppression of any attempts to leave the territory, the Town continued to exist.


The Town lives like never before! Immerse yourself in social life in new living conditions! Interact with gangs and Government, activists and eccentrics, citizens and lumpen. There are dozens of stories and quests that will introduce you to the history of the Town and its inhabitants.

However, you have the right to do whatever you want. Drive your private car through the streets, search for artifacts for collectors, explore abandoned Catacombs, start hunting for the most dangerous criminals, or just go to the bathhouse. Here everyone will find something to their liking!
